# Project Instructions

## Stack
- Backend: FastAPI + Jinja2 + SQLAlchemy
- Frontend: Bootstrap 5 + Documatica v12.0 Design System
- Database: PostgreSQL
- Payment: T-Bank (Tinkoff) Acquiring
- Deployment: Docker + Nginx

## Code Style
- Russian UI, English code
- No emojis anywhere
- PEP8 for Python
- BEM-like CSS classes

## Design System
Use v12-style skill for all UI components.
